body.name: Phone Tripod, 50-inch Extendable and Lightweight Aluminum Tripod Stand with Phone Clip, Portable Travel Tripod for Photography, Video Recording, Vlogging, and More
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 18 hrs 43 mins
features: 【Impressive Height】The tripod is designed at a max height of 50 inches when fully extended, which gives it more reach for special and diverse shooting needs. Meanwhile, it folds down to the wrist size of only 16.5 inches, packs down small in its own bag, super compact and convenient to use or store.

【High Compatibility】Coming with a dual extendable phone clip, which can be easily stretched up to a width of 3.75 inches/95 mm, suitable for iPhone and Android phones with or without a case. In addition, with the 1/4” standard screw, it’s compatible with digital cameras, video cameras, webcam, almost all devices on the market.

【3-Way Pan Head】Equipped with a stable 3-way pan head, It’s fully adjustable for tilt and swivel motion, allowing for more precise, reliable framing and shooting. Combined with the inbuilt bubble level, it provides everything you need to create outstanding panorama shots. Pro-grade snaps made easy with this handy gadget.

【Premium Aluminum Legs】Made of high-quality aluminum material, it offers ultra durability and stability at the same time. It weighs only 1.2 lbs, incredibly lightweight and portable, not only easy for carrying around, but also the most ideal travel companion while hiking, camping, having picnics, etc.
【After-sale Service】We will provide high quality after-sales service with 12 months. Please contact us anytime if you have any question.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 50-inch Functional Tripod, an ideal tool for content creators. It’s a multi-functional tripod designed for live streaming, vlogging, photography, etc. What’s more? It depends on how creative you are. This compact and portable tripod offers diverse possibilities for you to explore!

Package Includes 1 * 50” Tripod 1 * Carrying Bag 1 * Extendable Phone Clip 1 * User Manuel Specification Material: Aluminum alloy tube and plastic constructions Maximum height: 50inch/127cm Folded length: 16.5inch/41.9inch Weight: 1.2 Lbs/0.54kg Phone Clip: Max 5.5inches/14cm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Affordable, simple use. You get what you pay for. It works for simple webcams, but I doubt it can handle larger dslr cameras as it is weak. Works for our purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little lightweight, but works well enough for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I wouldn't use this for a heavy dSLR, but for a phone this is definitely more than sturdy enough. The phone holder is more than wide enough for my huge iPhone 13 Pro Max, even in its case, and the remote is super handy and easy to use. It's a decent enough tripod for the price but it's not professional quality by any means.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Value is Great
reviews.reviewText: I own 2 of these one for each vehicle. I love all the adjustments you can make depending on the needed angle of your shot. I use them both 3 or more times per week. Someday 3 of more times a day. These are accurate and I'm confident they will hold my camera or phone in desired angle. There has been a few times I've used them in windy conditions and Tripod performed very well. If I needed a third I would not hesitate to buy another. They are lightweight once you have it in the stored condition.i love them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Documenting At-Home-Gym Activities
reviews.reviewText: My son has an at-home-gym workout once or twice a week on the days he is not in school physically. To prove that he did a workout he has to submit a video of his activity. We bought this tripod to show him playing basketball, football tennis, squat thrusts etc.. Your get the idea. It is nice because we needed a tripod that is light, easy to unfold and fold up again, that keeps a good grip on our cell phone and yet is easy to attach and detach the phone. This tripod fit all of these requirements. It's like having our own personal videographer on call. We are not happy with all of the fearmongering and changes due to Covid-19 but have no fear. This tripod will make your life better and make you look like a professional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been perfect for over a year now!
reviews.reviewText: Been perfect for over a year now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Wow this is such a cool product! I haven’t tried the remote yet so can’t comment on that but I love the product so much. You can attach your DSLR camera or phone and everything is completely adjustable. It comes pretty small and I thought it would only go up a short length but it was adjustable up to almost my ceiling! It allows you to tilt up down & around which is awesome. Someone else said that you can only do landscape holding of the cellphone but you can actually rotate it (so many different adjustable things so I get not being able to figure it out). The ring light does need to be plugged in which means it can’t go suuuuper tall when using the ring light (the only thing I would change so far would be to make that cord longer). The tripod light gets super bright and has levels of brightness you can adjust. It’s lightweight, obviously not going to last for decades or anything but it’s affordable & has so much adjustability & many features.For $19 I was honestly expecting a piece of crap but I’m very impressed so far!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Portable Tripod For All Your Camera Needs
reviews.reviewText: While I loved the ease of using this tripod for video calls, especially with the kids, and how easy it was to put together it was very flimsy. It did not take much before one of the legs snapped off. While I appreciate the price, the quality just wasn't there. I feel like there are better products in a similar price range.
The media could not be loaded. To me,am cool with this product
Great price, and exactly as described. Just set it up and it's just right height. will try to use it to find out.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not quite as smooth as I would like. Mainly to hold a go pro in a stable position.
reviews.reviewText: The blue tooth remote works great. For the price I cannot argue with the quality. A bit flimsy but it works well.

reviews.reviewTitle: c’est très leger , il est super
reviews.reviewText: il est léger, facil a manipuler , rentre dans mon sac a dos sans problème, je l’ai tellement aimé que je me suis commandé un autre
I was surprised at how light and tough this little tripod was. Very versatile. Really happy with it
